title: Petition for freedom from Mass. - situation

content.question: Which of the following most likely helped to prompt the petition in the excerpt?

choices.label: American colonists’ declaration of independence from Britain
British promises of land for service in the American Revolution
The passage of the Stamp Act, a tax imposed on the American colonies by the British Parliament
The proliferation of religious revivals in the eighteenth century, commonly referred to as the Great Awakening

content.answer: American colonists’ declaration of independence from Britain
